text:
@GovRicketts Is it true that you are EXTORTING Nebraska cities not to require masks in public buildings by withholding COVID-19 aid?  Did tRump bribe you?  Are you drinking too much Koolaid in Nebraska? Masks reduce transmission 79%.

No irony your last name is for a bone deforming illness.
